description: This file defines data models for messages in a chat system, including classes for message content, references, citations, metrics, and methods for serialization, logging, and validation.

classes.name: MessageReferences
classes.description: Represents references added to a user message, including the query, references, and retrieval time.

classes.name: UrlCitation
classes.description: Represents a URL citation with optional URL and title.

classes.name: DocumentCitation
classes.description: Represents a document citation with optional title, cited text, and filename.

classes.name: Citations
classes.description: Holds various types of citations associated with a message, including raw data, URLs, and document citations.

classes.name: MessageMetrics
classes.description: Tracks various token and timing metrics related to a message, with methods for serialization, timing, and addition.

classes.name: Message
classes.description: Represents a chat message with content, role, media, citations, metrics, and methods for serialization, logging, and validation.

methods.name: get_content_string
methods.description: Returns the message content as a string, handling different content formats.

methods.name: to_dict
methods.description: Serializes the message object into a dictionary suitable for API or storage.

methods.name: to_function_call_dict
methods.description: Serializes the message into a dictionary suitable for function call representation.

methods.name: log
methods.description: Logs the message details to the console with optional metrics and level.

methods.name: content_is_valid
methods.description: Checks if the message content is valid (non-empty).
